com.adobe.cq.commerce.common

Class DefaultJcrCartEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.commerce.common.DefaultJcrCartEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommerceSession.CartEntry

    public class DefaultJcrCartEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommerceSession.CartEntry
    The default implementation for a CommerceSession.CartEntry used by AbstractJcrCommerceSession. Implementations requiring customization should extend this class and override AbstractJcrCommerceService.newCartEntryImpl(int, com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.Product, int) to return said extension.

      • getPriceInfo

        public java.util.List<PriceInfo> getPriceInfo(Predicate filter)
                                       throws CommerceException
        Description copied from interface: CommerceSession.CartEntry

        Get a list of detailed price info objects for a cart entry filtered by the provided predicate (usually a PriceFilter).

        Current components expect price infos with (at least) the following classifiers, in this order:

        1. "LINE" (line subtotal, generally without tax)
        2. "UNIT" (unit price, generally without tax)

        Example: to get the unit price of a cart entry, you could use the following statement:

         
 cartEntry.getPriceInfo(new PriceFilter("UNIT"));
        Specified by:
        getPriceInfo in interface CommerceSession.CartEntry
        Parameters:
        filter - An optional predicate used for filtering the PriceInfos. Pass null to fetch all PriceInfos.
        Returns:
        a list of prices, can be empty if no price matches.
        Throws:
        CommerceException
        See Also:
        PriceFilter

      • getPrice

        public java.lang.String getPrice(Predicate filter)
                          throws CommerceException

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(PriceInfo priceInfo,
                     java.lang.String... types)
        A helper routine which updates the cart entry prices with a new PriceInfo. If all the priceInfo's types match an existing entry, the entry will be updated.

        Note: automatically add the priceInfo's currencyCode as an additional tag to ease filtering on currency.

        Parameters:
        priceInfo - A PriceInfo containing the amount and currency.
        types - Classifiers indicating the usage of the PriceInfo (ie: "UNIT", "PRE_TAX").
